attributes.action: stop using Statutory Instruments as a means to make laws while by-passing parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Despite an unprecedented number of new Bills, the government is increasingly resorting to the use of Statutory Instruments to allow ministers to effectively introduce new regulations. This is highly undemocratic as our representatives do not have any chance to debate and vote on SIs. Indeed, so many SIs are raised that much legislation escapes any public attention.
This is rule by decree and the people of this country must be consulted and allowed to vote on changes that will affect them.
